---
title: savvi
---

savvi is a package for Safe Anytime Valid Inference. Also, it's a savvy pun.

Read the [docs](https://assuncaolfi.github.io/savvi/) for more.

## Install

Stable version:

```shell
pip install savvi
```

Development version:

```shell
pip install git+https://github.com/assuncaolfi/savvi
```
